name: Frontier Stable Token
description: The Frontier Stable Token (FRNT) stands as the first fully reserved, fiat-backed stable token to be issued by a U.S. public entity — the State of Wyoming — under the oversight of the Wyoming Stable Token Commission. Backed by to the U.S. dollar and short-term Treasury holdings, FRNT is built to power transactions that are secure, swift, cost-efficient, and borderless, while transforming its reserve foundation into a new, diversified revenue stream for the state.
